SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc27
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Game

Class Market

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Game.Market
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientMarket, Serializable
public class Market extends Object implements Serializable, ClientMarket
This class represents the market in the game, where players can draw cards either from decks or exposed cards
See Also:

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      isGold - Specifies whether to get face-up gold cards or face-up resource card
